UserComments.Comment:
The Park and Ride now closes at 19:30
Also anyone using this charger must use the bus service and will be fined £60 if they do not direct the bus driver to validate the plastic token dispenced by the barrier control panel. 
The bus driver is under no obligation to volunteer this information.

Two identical charge points (total of 4 bays) here. Both type 2 points in use with e-Car club vehicles, alternative point available in park and ride.
Chargemaster points are now/currently free.
This uses ChargeMaster which is far more expensive than running the petrol engine on my Ampera, so having parked up and had a look, I gave up and moved my Ampera to a normal parking slot...

UsageCost: Inclusive; for Polar Plus subscription members only. Bus ride mandatory

AddressInfo.Title: Stratford Park and Ride
AddressInfo.AccessComments: Public access,  bus ride mandatory. Opening Hours Mo-Sa 07:30–23:30. Not available on Sundays

GeneralComments: One charging point, two sockets, , One three pin BS1363 socket, rated at 3kW (mode 2; standard charge), , One seven pin Type 2 socket rated at 7kW , (mode 3; fast charge), , Fitted under Midlands PiP
